treatment-md.title: Endonura taurica Smolis, Skarżyński, Pomorski & Kaprus’, 2007, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Redescription of Endonura taurica (Stach, 1951) and E. quadriseta Cassagnau & Péja, 1979, and description of two new species of the genus Endonura Cassagnau, 1979 (Collembola: Neanuridae: Neanurinae) from the Crimea (Ukraine)
